feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.39
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2075:
  • Fix categories UI bug (#2064)
  • Fix how changelog quotes look in dark theme (#2065)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.38...v1.1.39

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.40
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added Korean translation. by @tkgo11 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2080
  • Fix and improve German translation by @ColorfulRhino in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2090
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2094
  • Attempt to fix "double download" bug (#2073)
  • Avoid JSON corruption when storage full (#2089)
  • Fix error when GitLab repo is in a subgroup (#2079)
  • Update screenshots in README

New Contributors

  • @tkgo11 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2080

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.39...v1.1.40

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.41
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2112
  • GitLab URL parsing bugfix (#2106)
  • Tencent store bugfix (#2108)
  • Allow for MarkDown inside "about" app field (#2109)
  • RuStore support by @PadowYT2 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2081 (for #1593)
  • Fix RuStore characterset issue + support RuStore app changelogs by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2113

New Contributors

  • @PadowYT2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2081

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.40...v1.1.41

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.42
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2129
  • Correct spelling of Wi-Fi - not "WiFi" (#2121)
  • Change font to Montserrat (#2122)
  • Extract GitLab Asset Filenames (#2127)
  • Fix "Bad State: No element" Error on Some Direct APK Links (#2128)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.41...v1.1.42

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.43
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bugfix - app crashes when language set to zh_Hant_TW by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2130

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.42...v1.1.43
